org.aludratest.service
Interface AludraContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
AludraServiceContext, AludraTestContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
AludraServiceContextImpl, AludraTestContextImpl
public interface AludraContext

Common interface for AludraTest Contexts. An AludraTest context is able to return arbitrary component instances for a given interface class.

Author:
falbrech

Method Summary
<T extends AludraService>
T
getNonLoggingService(ComponentId<T> serviceId)
          Provides a service with the given component ID for use within this context.

T
getService(ComponentId<T> serviceId)
          Provides a service with the given component ID for use within this context.
<T> T
newComponentInstance(Class<T> componentInterface)
          Creates a new instance of the given component class.
 

Method Detail

newComponentInstance

<T> T newComponentInstance(Class<T> componentInterface)
Creates a new instance of the given component class. If the component is a configurable object, it is configured before it is returned.

Parameters:
componentInterface - Component interface.
Returns:
An object of a class implementing the component interface.

getNonLoggingService

<T extends AludraService> T getNonLoggingService(ComponentId<T> serviceId)
Provides a service with the given component ID for use within this context. The service will not be wrapped with registered service wrappers, so operations on this service will not be logged or otherwise noticed.

Parameters:
serviceId - Service ID for the service.
Returns:
The service object for use.

getService

<T extends AludraService> T getService(ComponentId<T> serviceId)
Provides a service with the given component ID for use within this context. The service will be wrapped with registered service wrappers, so operations on this service will be logged.

Parameters:
serviceId - Service ID for the service.
Returns:
The service object for use.
